amendment.description: To require the approval of Congress before additional countries may join the Trans-Pacific Partnership Agreement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1251 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 189.

action.text: Amendment SA 1251 proposed by Senator Brown to Amendment SA 1221. (consideration: CR S2967-2968; text: CR S2967) To require the approval of Congress before additional countries may join the Trans-Pacific Partnership Agreement.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1251 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 189.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1251 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 189.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1251 proposed by Senator Brown to Amendment SA 1221.
